com.konakart.bl.modules.payment.globalcollect

Class GlobalCollectCustom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.bl.modules.payment.globalcollect.GlobalCollectCustomBase
      • com.konakart.bl.modules.payment.globalcollect.GlobalCollectCustom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GlobalCollectCustomIf

    public class GlobalCollectCustom
extends GlobalCollectCustomBase
    Global Collect Custom Utilities - this provides a default implementation. It is expected that Customers may implement their own versions of this class then specify the name of the class in the module configuration parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfInstallments

        public int getNumberOfInstallments(OrderIf order)
        We'll just use the Base implementation here but Customers can create their own versions that implement custom rules.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfInstallments in interface GlobalCollectCustomIf
        Overrides:
        getNumberOfInstallments in class GlobalCollectCustomBase
        Parameters:
        order - the Order which should contain information on it that will indicate the number of installments.
        Returns:
        the number of installments to define in the PaymentDetails parameter list. Return -1 to indicate that no installments are required.
